alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 6:32AM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Dublin affecting Johnson, Washington, Wilkinson and Laurens Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River at Dublin. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, minor flooding spreads further into the woodland areas. The water level begins to flood Rex Miller Road... downstream left bank of the Highway 80 bridge. Also Old River Lane...upstream and left bank from the bridge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EST Sunday the stage was 23.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 21 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 645 PM EST.
